elements.title: lang::report_dashboard_page_1_users::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT CONCAT(
    (SELECT count(*) AS num FROM mdl_user WHERE id > 1 AND deleted = 0),
    ' / ',
    (SELECT count(*) AS num FROM mdl_user WHERE id > 1 AND deleted = 0 AND lastaccess > 0)
)

elements.title: lang::report_dashboard_page_1_online::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT CONCAT(
    (
         SELECT count(id)
           FROM mdl_user
          WHERE lastaccess > UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 300
       GROUP BY id
    ),
    ' / ',
    (
        SELECT count(id)
          FROM mdl_user
         WHERE lastaccess > UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 3600
      GROUP BY id
    )
)

elements.title: lang::report_dashboard_page_1_cursos::local_kopere_bi
lang::report_4_enrolpercourse::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT c.fullname,
       SUM(CASE 
               WHEN ue.status = 0 AND (ue.timeend = 0 OR ue.timeend > UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) THEN 1
               ELSE 0
           END) AS 'lang::active_enrolments::local_kopere_bi',
       SUM(CASE 
               WHEN ue.status = 1 THEN 1
               ELSE 0
           END) AS 'lang::inactive_enrolments::local_kopere_bi',
       SUM(CASE 
               WHEN ue.status = 0 AND ue.timeend > 0 AND ue.timeend < UNIX_TIMESTAMP() THEN 1
               ELSE 0
           END) AS 'lang::expired_enrolments::local_kopere_bi'
FROM mdl_course c
JOIN mdl_enrol e ON e.courseid = c.id
JOIN mdl_user_enrolments ue ON ue.enrolid = e.id
GROUP BY c.id
ORDER BY c.fullname

elements.title: lang::report_dashboard_page_1_newusers::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(timecreated, '%m/%Y') AS yearmonth,
         COUNT(id) AS 'lang::num_user::local_kopere_bi'
    FROM mdl_user
   WHERE deleted = 0
     AND confirmed = 1
     AND timecreated >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH))
GROUP BY yearmonth
ORDER BY yearmonth DESC
